alert.note: Alert for Benton; Cedar; Iowa; Jefferson; Johnson; Jones; Keokuk; Linn; Muscatine; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 12:14AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Keokuk, western Cedar, Johnson, southeastern Benton, Washington, southwestern Jones, northwestern Muscatine, northern Jefferson, southern Linn and Iowa Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1213 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Swisher to near Eddyville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... North Liberty, Swisher and Shueyville around 1220 AM CDT. Ely around 1225 AM CDT. Bertram and Lake Macbride State Park around 1230 AM CDT. Solon around 1235 AM CDT. Mount Vernon, Lisbon and Hedrick around 1245 AM CDT. Martinsburg around 1250 AM CDT. Mechanicsville, Stanwood, Packwood and Abingdon around 100 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Middle Amana, Sugar Bottom Camp Ground, Johnson County Fairgrounds, Pekin, High Amana, Lake Darling State Park, Thornburg, Keokuk County Fairgrounds, Washington County Fairgrounds and West Amana. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 214 and 257. Interstate 380 between mile markers 1 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Quad Cities. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern and east central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Cedar; Iowa; Jefferson; Johnson; Jones; Keokuk; Linn; Muscatine; Washington
